item.description:
Please RSVP!

The IBD CANSLIM meetings will continue to be at MIT, not in Waltham. They will start at 7pm, not 6pm. We are scheduled for room 395, but I anticipate that 335 will be free, so we will try to hold it there. Check the signs.


This will be the fourth in the IBD Meetup curriculum series. This lesson: Past Chart Patterns for Historical Precedent to Find Current Winning Stocks. Kier McDonough will again be presenting. For those of you who don't know, Kier runs Brigos Capital Management on CANSLIM principles and has taught Level I and Level II courses for Investors Business Daily.


If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, please come. Moving the meeting back to MIT, using the IBD provided curriculum and having Kier present is a definite improvement.

» Here’s a link to the PDF file for the fourth lesson:Fourth Lesson
Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD CANSLIM Meeting - Past Chart Patterns for Historical Precedent
